query:
SELECT 
  e.id,
  e.tipoEvento,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM briefing_grupo WHERE eventoId = e.id) as grupos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM briefing_formando WHERE eventoId = e.id) as formandos
FROM eventos e
INNER JOIN turmas t ON t.id = e.turmaId
WHERE t.codigo = '654'
ORDER BY e.id;
